dreamMixedModel - run dream mixed model note due to this issue must require variancepartition https://github.com/GabrielHoffman/variancePartition/issues/17

Source: R/pseudobulk_de.R
dreamMixedModel.Rd

dreamMixedModel - run dream mixed model note due to this issue must require variancepartition https://github.com/GabrielHoffman/variancePartition/issues/17

dreamMixedModel(
  dge_lists,
  apriori_contrasts = FALSE,
  sample_column,
  contrast_matrix = NULL,
  design_matrix,
  fixed_effects,
  cell_metadata,
  lme4_formula = "~ 0 + cohort_timepoint + (1|sampleid)",
  plotsavepath,
  ncores = 4
)

Arguments

dge_lists

list of dgelists created with NormalizePseudobulk
apriori_contrasts

one of TRUE or FALSE, whether to fit a priori contrasts
sample_column

quoted character e.g. "sample" the subject level sample variable should have multiple timepoints subjectID_timepoint i.e. s1_0, s1_1
contrast_matrix

contrast matrix created with make.contrasts
design_matrix

design matrix created with BulkDesignMatrix
fixed_effects

a vector of covariates that are columns in metadata e.g. a vector of 'age' 'gender'
cell_metadata

metadata cells-rows variables-columns i.e. ColData or seuratmeta.data
lme4_formula

symbolic model formula the default is '~ 0 + cohort_timepoint + (1|sampleid)'
plotsavepath

a path to save created plot of contrasts
ncores

number of cores for doParallel

Value

list of model fits indexed by celltype

Examples

# run dream mixed model
